description:
PyCalc - SE is a Simpler GUI Version of PyCalc consisting of the Basic Calculator!



PyCalc-SE got a new Light Theme!
Release Notes :
- [ MAIN UPDATE! ] : Now PyCalc-SE supports light theme!
- Larger window to accomodate larger outputs.
- PyCalc-SE now remembers how large/small your window was and where it was.
- Bug Fixes
Preview of light theme :
image
Installing PyCalc-SE from Winget :
winget install PyCalc-SE
Installation and Requirements :
- Any system with Python installed.
- Requires PySide6 package to be installed via pip!
- No Python installation needed if using Installer or PyCalc-SE.exe on Windows Systems or PyCalc-SE file on Linux Systems!
Note from Developer :
Appreciate my effort? Why not leave a Star ‚≠ê ! Also if forked, please credit me for my effort and thanks if you do! :)
